snippet.title: Yakuza Kiwami 2 - Majima Construction Anthem
snippet.description:
Yakuza Kiwami 2 is available now! http://yakuza.sega.com/

A company song originally composed in Japanese to boost morale for the hard-working employees of Majima Construction (which you’ll learn about in the game’s new Majima Saga!), this English rendition was created just for the Western launch of the game. Warm up your vocal chords and sing along to the Majima Construction Anthem!
